resources.string:
1 cup nonfat refried beans,
 1 1/3 cup finely chopped green onions,
 1 teaspoon chili powder,
 1/8 teaspoon salt,
 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder,
 1/8 teaspoon cumin,
 1/2 cup shredded reduced fat Cheddar Cheese,
 1/2 cup chopped tomatoes,
 1/2 cup shredded romaine,
 1 bag baked, not fried tortilla chips

1 Combine beans, onions, chili powder, salt, garlic powder and cumin, mix well.
 2 Spread mixture evenly in 9-inch microwave-safe pie plate.
 3 Microwave on high for 1 1/2 to 2 1/2 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
 4 Sprinkle cheese evenly over top.
 5 Microwave on high for 30 seconds or until cheese is melted.
 6 Sprinkle tomatoes evenly over cheese; arrange lettuce around edge of pie plate.
 7 Serve immediately with chips
